workflow.name: GPT 4.1-mini automated proposal to payment lifecycle management
workflow.description:
## How It Works
This workflow automates end-to-end contract and invoice management using AI intelligence. It processes proposals through intelligent contract generation, approval workflows, and automated invoicing. OpenAI analyzes proposal content while the system routes approvals intelligently. Upon approval, contracts are generated, invoices created, and notifications sent. The workflow also monitors payment status, generates financial forecasts, and manages follow-up tasks, eliminating manual contract generation delays and approval bottlenecks while ensuring accurate financial record-keeping.


## Setup Steps
1. Configure OpenAI API credentials in n8n credentials manager. 
2. Connect Google Sheets account for invoice and forecast storage. 
3. Set up Gmail for approval notifications and client communications. 
4. Input Stripe/payment processor credentials for payment tracking. 
5. Map proposal form inputs to workflow start node.

## Prerequisites
OpenAI API key, Google Sheets account, Gmail account, Stripe/payment processor access

## Use Cases
Multi-stage approval workflows, SaaS contract management, professional services invoicing

## Customization
Modify approval logic in conditional nodes, replace OpenAI with Anthropic API

## Benefits
Reduces contract processing time by 80%, eliminates approval delays, prevents invoicing errors

workflow.name: GPT 4.1-mini Automated Proposal to Payment Lifecycle Management

parameters.formDescription: Submit your project details to generate a proposal

options.systemMessage:
You are a professional proposal writer. Generate a comprehensive business proposal based on the provided client and project information.

Your proposal should include:
1. Executive Summary
2. Project Scope and Objectives
3. Methodology and Approach
4. Timeline and Milestones
5. Budget Breakdown
6. Terms and Conditions
7. Next Steps

Make the proposal professional, persuasive, and tailored to the client needs. Use clear language and structure.

parameters.message:
=

Proposal Approval Request

A new proposal has been generated and requires your approval.

{{ $json.proposalTitle }}

Client: {{ $('Store Proposal Request').first().json.clientName }}

Project: {{ $('Store Proposal Request').first().json.projectTitle }}

Budget: ${{ $('Store Proposal Request').first().json.budget }}

Executive Summary

{{ $json.executiveSummary }}

Please review the full proposal and respond with your decision.
parameters.subject: =Proposal Approval Required: {{ $json.proposalTitle }}

options.systemMessage:
You are a legal contract specialist. Convert the approved proposal into a formal contract document.

Your contract should include:
1. Contract Title and Parties
2. Scope of Work (based on proposal)
3. Payment Terms
4. Timeline and Deliverables
5. Intellectual Property Rights
6. Confidentiality Clause
7. Termination Conditions
8. Liability and Warranties
9. Dispute Resolution
10. Signatures Section

Use formal legal language while remaining clear and enforceable.

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
	"contractTitle": "Professional Services Agreement",
	"parties": "This agreement is between [Client Name] and [Service Provider]",
	"scopeOfWork": "Description of services to be provided",
	"paymentTerms": "Payment schedule and terms",
	"deliverables": "Timeline and deliverables description",
	"ipRights": "Intellectual property rights terms",
	"confidentiality": "Confidentiality agreement terms",
	"termination": "Conditions for contract termination",
	"liability": "Liability and warranty provisions",
	"disputeResolution": "Dispute resolution procedures"
}

options.systemMessage:
You are an accounting specialist. Generate a professional invoice based on the contract details.

Your invoice should include:
1. Invoice Number (generate unique ID)
2. Invoice Date (current date)
3. Due Date (based on payment terms)
4. Bill To (client information)
5. Itemized Services (from contract scope)
6. Subtotal, Tax, and Total Amount
7. Payment Instructions
8. Terms and Conditions

Format the invoice professionally and include all necessary financial details.

parameters.message:
=

Invoice

Dear {{ $('Store Proposal Request').first().json.clientName }},

Please find your invoice below:

Invoice Number: {{ $json.invoiceNumber }}

Invoice Date: {{ $json.invoiceDate }}

Due Date: {{ $json.dueDate }}

Bill To

{{ $json.billTo }}

Services

{{ $json.itemizedServices }}

Subtotal: ${{ $json.subtotal }}

Tax: ${{ $json.tax }}

Total Amount Due: ${{ $json.totalAmount }}

Payment Instructions

{{ $json.paymentInstructions }}

Thank you for your business!
parameters.subject: =Invoice {{ $json.invoiceNumber }} - {{ $('Store Proposal Request').first().json.projectTitle }}

parameters.message:
=

Payment Reminder

Dear Customer,

This is a friendly reminder that invoice {{ $json.invoiceNumber }} is now {{ $json.daysOverdue }} days overdue.

Invoice Number: {{ $json.invoiceNumber }}

Due Date: {{ $json.dueDate }}

Amount Due: ${{ $json.totalAmount }}

Please submit payment at your earliest convenience. If you have already paid, please disregard this notice.

{{ $json.paymentInstructions }}

If you have any questions, please contact us.

Thank you!
parameters.subject: =Payment Reminder: Invoice {{ $json.invoiceNumber }} - {{ $json.daysOverdue }} Days Overdue

options.systemMessage:
You are a financial analyst specializing in revenue forecasting. Analyze the invoice and payment data to generate revenue forecasts.

Your forecast should include:
1. Expected Revenue (based on invoice amounts)
2. Collection Probability (based on payment history and overdue status)
3. Projected Collection Date
4. Risk Assessment (low, medium, high)
5. Cash Flow Impact
6. Recommendations for follow-up actions

Provide data-driven insights and actionable recommendations.

assignments.name: taskDescription
assignments.value: =Follow up on overdue invoice. Risk: {{ $json.riskAssessment }}. Recommendations: {{ $json.recommendations }}

parameters.message:
=

Proposal Status Update

Dear {{ $('Store Proposal Request').first().json.clientName }},

Thank you for your interest in our services. After careful review, we regret to inform you that we are unable to proceed with the proposal at this time.

Project: {{ $('Store Proposal Request').first().json.projectTitle }}

We appreciate your consideration and hope to work with you on future opportunities.

Best regards
parameters.subject: =Proposal Update: {{ $('Generate Proposal').first().json.proposalTitle }}

parameters.content:
## Customization
Modify approval logic in conditional nodes, replace OpenAI with Anthropic API

## Benefits
Reduces contract processing time by 80%, eliminates approval delays, prevents invoicing errors

## Setup Steps
1. Configure OpenAI API credentials in n8n credentials manager. 
2. Connect Google Sheets account for invoice and forecast storage. 
3. Set up Gmail for approval notifications
4. Input Stripe/payment processor credentials for payment tracking.

## Prerequisites
OpenAI API key, Google Sheets account, Gmail account, Stripe/payment processor access

## Use Cases
Multi-stage approval workflows, SaaS contract management, professional services invoicing

## How It Works
This workflow automates end-to-end contract and invoice management using AI intelligence. It processes proposals through intelligent contract generation, approval workflows, and automated invoicing. OpenAI analyzes proposal content while the system routes approvals intelligently. Upon approval, contracts are generated, invoices created, and notifications sent. The workflow also monitors payment status, generates financial forecasts, and manages follow-up tasks, eliminating manual contract generation delays and approval bottlenecks while ensuring accurate financial record-keeping.

## Proposal Intake & Configuration
### What
Receives proposal requests and configures workflow parameters via form inputs.
### Why
Establishes initial data and user preferences for accurate downstream processing.

## AI-Powered Proposal Analysis
### What
OpenAI analyzes proposal content using the Chat Model Reason Output Parser.
### Why
Extracts key business logic and decision criteria for intelligent routing.

## Intelligent Approval Routing
### What
Routes proposals to appropriate approvers based on AI recommendations.
### Why
Accelerates approvals by directing requests to relevant stakeholders.

## Contract & Invoice Generation
### What
Auto-generates contracts and invoices; updates payment tracking.
### Why
Eliminates manual document creation, ensures consistency, and reduces errors.

## Financial Forecasting
### What
Generates revenue forecasts and tracks invoice status via Google Sheets.
### Why
Provides real-time financial visibility and predictive insights.

user.name: Cheng Siong Chin
user.bio: Dr. Cheng Siong CHIN is an n8n workflow creator specializing in AI-powered automation, agent orchestration, and intelligent system integrations. He designs and builds end-to-end workflows that combine LLMs, APIs, and data pipelines to streamline complex processes and deliver production-ready automation solutions. Contact me to discuss custom AI workflows and agent architectures.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
